modName: Stop The Dark Brotherhood Forever Quest From Returning
summary: This will stop \"The Dark Brotherhood Forever\" quest from returning
descriptionHtml:
This will stop \"The Dark Brotherhood Forever\" quest from returning. Use Nexus Mod Manager to install that way you can just disable the mod when you want to run some more of the quests.

To get rid of current open quest open the console with ~ then type setstage dbrecurring 200
